text: Bernhard Berthelsen (16 March 1897 - 25 August 1964) was a Norwegian politician for the Liberal Party. Berthelsen was born in Sør-Audnedal. He was elected to the Norwegian Parliament from the Market towns of Telemark and Aust-Agder counties in 1945, and was re-elected on one occasion. Berthelsen was a deputy member of the executive committee of Arendal city council from 1934 to 1940. He then sat as a regular city council member in the periods 1940-1944 and 1945-1946\. He was later a member of Bergen city council during the term 1955-1959\. ==References== * Category:1897 births Category:1964 deaths Category:Liberal Party (Norway) politicians Category:Members of the Storting Category:20th-century Norwegian politicians
title: Bernhard Berthelsen
